mapper.select: SELECT B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ AS busStopCategorySeq, B.BUSSTOPCATEGORY AS busStopCategory, B.UNIVERSITYSEQ AS universitySeq,B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSTAT AS busStopCategoryStat, A.UNIVERSITYNAME AS universityName, GROUPBUSHASH AS groupbusHashkey FROM BUSSTOP_CATEGORY B INNER JOIN (SELECT * FROM UNIVERSITY WHERE UNIVERSITYSEQ =#{seq}) A ON A.UNIVERSITYSEQ = B.UNIVERSITYSEQ WHERE B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSTAT='show' ORDER BY B.BUSSTOPCATEGORYSEQ ASC
